i.e the line may look like

public byte[] description; // aByteArray777

item.title: [Delta] Objects
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

I’ve edited an object name and examine in class46, but I don’t know what the line should be for a right click option. For example, I have a custom object that I need to be mine-able, what do I need to add?

This is what I have:

if(i == 13180) { class46.aString739 = "Rune Essence"; class46.aByteArray777 = "A large chunk of Rune Essence that can be mined from.".getBytes(); }

Read full topic
